dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'fmMM/DD/YY') run_date, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'fmHH:MI PM') run_time FROM DUAL

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:OP_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'MM/DD/YY') op_s_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:OP_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'MM/DD/YY') op_e_date, :P_IMPORT_EXPORT import_export, LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',') loc_num FROM DUAL

SELECT /*+ ALL_ROWS */ TRIM(con1.first_name || ' ' || con1.last_name) ops_manager, j.job_xid house_bill_lading, loc2.location_xid account_no, c1.contact_xid carrier, j.attribute5 master_bill_lading, cv.departure_date s_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') open_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') sail_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') arrival_date, 'Yes' missing_ar FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid ='TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid='VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary='Y' AND s.perspective='B' INNER JOIN location loc1 ON s.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid AND loc1.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN','MEX') INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip2 ON s.shipment_gid = sip2.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con2 ON sip2.involved_party_contact_gid = con2.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON con2.location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN contact c1 ON cv.servprov_gid = c1.contact_gid WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND j.move_perspective_gid = 'EXPORT' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT js.status_value_gid FROM job_status js WHERE js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.job_gid = j.job_gid) AND (TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:OP_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:OP_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:P_IMPORT_EXPORT = 'EXPORT' OR :P_IMPORT_EXPORT = 'BOTH') AND (:LOC IS NULL OR (NOT :LOC IS NULL AND j.attribute4 IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt))) AND NOT ((SELECT COUNT(istat.status_value_gid) FROM job_order_release_join joj INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vs ON joj.order_release_gid = vs.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment ship ON vs.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship.is_primary = 'Y' AND ship.perspective = 'S' INNER JOIN shipment_bill sb ON ship.shipment_gid = sb.shipment_gid INNER JOIN invoice inv ON sb.bill_gid = inv.invoice_gid INNER JOIN invoice_status istat ON inv.invoice_gid = istat.invoice_gid AND istat.status_type_gid ='SCOULAR/NVO.BILL_APPROVAL' AND istat.status_value_gid ='SCOULAR/NVO.BILL_APPROVAL_APPROVED' WHERE joj.job_gid = j.job_gid) > 0) UNION SELECT /*+ ALL_ROWS */ TRIM(con1.first_name || ' ' || con1.last_name) ops_manager, j.job_xid house_bill_lading, loc2.location_xid account_no, c1.contact_xid carrier, j.attribute5 master_bill_lading, cv.departure_date s_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') open_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') sail_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') arrival_date, 'Yes' missing_ar FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid ='TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid='VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary='Y' AND s.perspective='B' INNER JOIN location loc1 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid AND loc1.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN','MEX') INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip2 ON s.shipment_gid = sip2.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con2 ON sip2.involved_party_contact_gid = con2.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON con2.location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN contact c1 ON cv.servprov_gid = c1.contact_gid WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND j.move_perspective_gid = 'IMPORT' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT js.status_value_gid FROM job_status js WHERE js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.job_gid = j.job_gid) AND (TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:OP_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:OP_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:P_IMPORT_EXPORT = 'IMPORT' OR :P_IMPORT_EXPORT = 'BOTH') AND (:LOC IS NULL OR (NOT :LOC IS NULL AND j.attribute4 IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt))) AND NOT ((SELECT COUNT(istat.status_value_gid) FROM job_order_release_join joj INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vs ON joj.order_release_gid = vs.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment ship ON vs.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship.is_primary = 'Y' AND ship.perspective = 'S' INNER JOIN shipment_bill sb ON ship.shipment_gid = sb.shipment_gid INNER JOIN invoice inv ON sb.bill_gid = inv.invoice_gid INNER JOIN invoice_status istat ON inv.invoice_gid = istat.invoice_gid AND istat.status_type_gid ='SCOULAR/NVO.BILL_APPROVAL' AND istat.status_value_gid ='SCOULAR/NVO.BILL_APPROVAL_APPROVED' WHERE joj.job_gid = j.job_gid) > 0) ORDER BY s_date, house_bill_lading
